Blood donation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A man is lying on a bed. Two men and a woman appear to be drawing blood from his arm.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Blood donations; Interiors; Medical equipment and supplies; Nurses; Physicians
Dubin, Max; Harvey, Roberta; Inda; Frank; Orenger, Ray
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal article of January 4, 1945. From left to right, Ray Orenger (donor); Frank Inda, Max Dubin and Roberta Harvey at bottom right.
